website_summaries.verdict: Brightly colored and long-lasting decals of your favorite Disney princesses.
pros: Includes 8 Disney princess decals and numerous background decals
Can be applied to textured walls
Can be peeled off and reapplied multiple times without losing stickiness or leaving a residue
cons: Stickers have a slight chemical smell when first opened, but it fades quickly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! So worth it and perfect addition to my daughter's room!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures show the size and it's what the post says. They stick the first time no transfer paper needed. They are able to be peeled off and replaced until you find the spot you want it. Like big stickers, and they are colorful and vibrant. My daughter loves them and had fun helping pick spots for them. Her room is green and they work well with that color background. Def worth the money, it's a sure buy. I'll def recommend RoomMates to everyone!
customer_reviews.author: MizzMeganMae

customer_reviews.title: Really great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: These are great. We bought these last year and used them as potty training prizes and our daughter was always excited to get another one for her wall. This year, we've repainted and arranged the decals on her doors. I'm very impressed, not just with the reusability (peeling them off and putting them elsewhere did not hinder the sticking quality), but with how well they stick and mold to different surfaces and textures. I've added a photo of the decals on her door. Really great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJ

customer_reviews.title: YES YES YES you want and need these if you have a princess loving little girl!
customer_reviews.text: BEST WALL STICKERS OUT THERE!!! The joy on my daughters face when she got home and saw these all over her bedroom door. They adhere so easily and very very well to the wall. Be sure to clean surface with rubbing alcohol and make sure it is dry. They peel off with ease and leave no residue on the wall. They are AMAZING quality and I would recommend them to anyone. They have some glitter on them for those anti-glitter people but from my experience the glitter did not come off at all even after all the rubbing I did to make sure they adhere to the door. This momma approves of these 100 percent.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Zishka

customer_reviews.title: Allowed my 6-year old daughter to decorate her room her way
customer_reviews.text: I let my daughter decorate her own room with these and she loves them. Amusingly, the problem with her decorating her own room is that most of these stickers are not above 3.5 feet off the ground. We had no problems with any of the stickers - either with initial adhesion or if we wanted to remove and place elsewhere. They're good quality and allowing my daughter to idolize her favorite Disney princesses
customer_reviews.author: D. Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to remove with no residue left behind
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to complete the princess bed. My daughter is very much into the princesses so everything is pink, purple and princess. We allowed her to stick them how she wanted and that's what she did. We love them because they come off easy. They dont leave any glue residue behind so you never know they were there. The smaller stickers were placed alongside the bed and in the steps but she has already removed them. They also stick very well on our concrete walls. When her room is complete we will order again to decorate the walls.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed M

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My little loves these wall stickers!! They were so easy to adhere to the wall (I stuck on white painted walls) and easily come off to readjust or remove. I love that these stickers are a step above basic in that the dresses and little extra stickers have glitter, making them extra special. The glitter does not flake off at all! There are quite a few princesses, as well as extra little stickers that go with them. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Practical Mama

customer_reviews.title: Princess decals
customer_reviews.text: So darn cute & girly. I ordered this for one of my nieces for Christmas & I'm sure that she'll love them. I wish I had another little girl so I could decorate her room since my daughter is all grown up.I went through the princess phase with her but now there is so much more awesome stuff than there was about 15 years ago. Anyhow, they're beautiful. UPDATE: This seller is absolutely amazing! I accidentally ordered 2 of the Princess Decals. When I contacted the seller & explained the mishap, I could not believe how courteous & understanding they were. They quickly resolved the issue & credited my account without hesitation. I will definitely purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: So-Lo

customer_reviews.title: really good wall decals
customer_reviews.text: i gave them to my daughter for her room adn she loves them. they stick well, and restick well since she had to move them and make it "right" lol. great buy if you are looking for princess themed wall decals. has the name of all the princesses in a seperate decal and the items that come siwth each princess are also stand alone so you can customize where to put everything.
customer_reviews.author: kmlopez85

customer_reviews.title: Great Products
customer_reviews.text: Great size and look great on the wall. They stick very well on the wall. I did not prep the wall by cleaning and rubbing alcohol. I simply placed them on the wall as soon as they arrived and they are holding up just fine. I would not hesitate to buy again! Buy with confidence. I did get paid or receive a discount for my review. Just want to share my experience with others.
customer_reviews.author: The Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Amazing decals! Not too big, not too small, easy to apply and no wall damage or residue. They can be removed and re positioned multiple times and not fall down. RoomMates does a great job with their wall decals. The print quality is excellent, crisp and clear with vibrant colors. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Duh Slacks

customer_reviews.title: Fun little decoration for them that doesn't seem to hurt ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute design...have three girls who were excited to put them up in their room. They did rip a few of them in their haste to get them on the wall, which was a bummer, but they were salvaged by sticking them back together. They've been moved a few times too as we've rearranged the room and are still clinging alright. Fun little decoration for them that doesn't seem to hurt the paint or leave any sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eliker

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: These are just what we wanted. They stay on the wall. We have not tried to remove them and/or reattach them. They are a little more expensive than the last set of wall decals I purchased (different brand/company/character).
customer_reviews.author: kcrawford

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These disney princess wall decals are so cute! My daughter absolutely loves them! They were easy to put up and stick very well, even after adjusting them, removing them, and sticking them to a different place. I just put glitter on my daughter's name letters on the wall as well, so the sparkles on the decals compliment very well. (I almost bought another disney princess wall decal but a lot of them don't have the glitter like this one does). I think any girl will love these!
customer_reviews.author: Tiara

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, even on textured walls!
customer_reviews.text: These stuck to our textured walls wonderfully. It’s been about a year and they still look great. I do not move them, but my youngest has removed one a few times and it still stays put after I get it back on the wall. The prints, colors and glitter are very pretty. The glitter doesn’t come off which is an extra bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Easy removal and easy adhering.
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and perfect sizes to put on the wall of my daughter room. They are removeable and restickable as well. My toddler has pulled them off and reattached them and I've pulled them off to put them higher up. They've been moved maybe 5 times and still are adhering with no sign of falling off. I wish they also included other princesses like Mulan, Merida, and Pocahontas though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Every little girls dream
customer_reviews.text: These Disney Princesses are every little girls dream. They are so pretty. Each one comes with a few things that represent them. Like Cinderella come with a glass slipper and a clock. They stick to the wall very well. They even stick to the closet door that has texture on it.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her princess stickers!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves her princess stickers! They come off/on very easy. We had to peel them off when we moved and I was able to put them back on original paper for the move. We have not put them back up in our new home yet, but im hoping it will stick the same as before. It did leave a little residue/princess outline on the wall after peeling off, but not bad. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kiel

customer_reviews.title: Makes the granddaughters room shine
customer_reviews.text: These cling to smooth sheetrock painted wall well. Great color and designs. Great character selection. Easy to adhere to the walls. The only complaint would be that several of the clings were difficult to peel off of the sheet, but none of them tore when taking off sheet.
customer_reviews.author: WRS

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and stick amazingly!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are great and my 3 year old - princess obsessed - little girl was beyond thrilled when we put them up. Each princess comes with 3-5 small stickers that go with their story. They are smaller than I hoped but my daughter couldn’t care less! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Used to make Disney Cruise door magnets
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set to create magnets for the door on our Disney cruise. I put them on white card stock, laminated them and glued magnets to the back. Super easy and inexpensive way to have a quality set of decorations.
customer_reviews.author: LHH

customer_reviews.title: This brand is great! Looks beautiful and very easy to stick and peel.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product!! Peel and stick easily and nicely. And also feel safe using since it says free from harmful chemicals. This brand is great! I had to peel off couple of times to make it look the way I like it and it still peels easily and sticks very well. Very quick shipping! It looks beautiful after sticking on the wall and princess looks very nice! love the names and little stickers to add to background.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great, Fun Princess Wall Decorations
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old loves these that she got for Christmas. They’re cute and fun and really easy to do. My 8 yr old took them right up to her room and decorated her room with them herself without help. She has moved them around a few times, sticking and resticking and LOVES having them.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: These little princesses are cute and a little bigger than I expected but that is good with me! Love how they have extras to go with each princess too. And the glitter on their dresses😍 Adorable. Got them to go with the castle I got as well.
customer_reviews.author: JayCamaroGirl

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: These princess stickers are great! My 3 year old loves them! She was so excited when she saw them on her wall that she almost didn't even care about her new big girl bed. The sizes are great, not too big and not too small. They went on nicely and I look forward to being able to move them if I want to. They have stood up to her touching them alot pointing out her favorites. The one suggestion I would have is that there was no Elsa or Anna which are her absolute favorites so I had to buy a Frozen sticker pack to get those. Not the end of the world though as the prices were great too.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Great non-permanent decoration
customer_reviews.text: These stick to textured walls with no problem. They are easy to reposition. The colors are bright and vivid. My princess-loving daughter has enjoyed picking one princess a night (since receiving) to add to the wall. They don't appear to leave any residue.
customer_reviews.author: Minh N

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute but came damaged
customer_reviews.text: Disney wall princess decals are being used in my toddler's big girl room transformation, these were super cute and the glitter sparkle made them even better. She absolutely adores them on her wall. Unfortunately they were difficult to remove and install as most of the decals had cut lines through them...I was still able to use them as I am good a lining up the pieces from doing other decals. Peel off the wall easily...did this a lot to line up the pieces. Would have been easy to install if I were not lining up pieces or partial cut decals. Disappointed in the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Dolan

customer_reviews.title: A must have for any princess fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 4 year old daughter. She is a huge princess fan. They've been up on her bedroom wall since Christmas and we have moved them all a few times. They are very easy to move. They stick to the wall smoothly, they are beautiful and vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Princess stickers
customer_reviews.text: I love that the shopping was so fast and that the stickers are HUGE AND BEAUTIFUL! My daughter loves them! Heck I love them too. Only reason why I'm giving it a 4 star is because Belle fell off the wall in about 3 days on only. We tried to stick it back on, but it wasn't the same anymore and jasmine is starting to peel off too. So every now and then, I have to go press really hard on the stickers just to make sure that they stay stuck on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaL

customer_reviews.title: So shimmery!
customer_reviews.text: These wall stickers were the perfect final touch for my daughters new big girl princess bed. Note that this wall contains some other decals I had there before- the plant looking ones. Beautiful detail and vibrant color.
customer_reviews.author: MStapley

customer_reviews.title: Great price and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these on her walls. Very pretty. It's free form, so I would suggest maybe arranging them first with a small piece of tape before applying so you don't have to reapply. It comes off easy, but probably won't stick well after a few times of doing it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Smith

customer_reviews.title: I was hesitant to order for the price but I was very happy once I got them in
customer_reviews.text: There are A LOT of decals in this package. I did not realize that. I was hesitant to order for the price but I was very happy once I got them in. There are 8 princesses and each princess has 4 decals with them that go to their story. The decals are large too and look bright and pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley311

customer_reviews.title: Makes a nice themed toddler room
customer_reviews.text: Decals came exactly as described. Very happy with our purchase! Each princess is about 12 inches, and include a lot of little "detail" stickers. We paired this with the RoomMates QVC0001TB Frozen Character/Ice Palace Wall Decal Set to decorate our toddler daughter's bedroom, and it came out very nice on her off-white walls. Would recommend to anyone looking to decorate a room for children!
customer_reviews.author: Grafted into truth ministries

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My kid became enamored with Disney princesses after we went on a Disney cruise, so we bought this for her as a birthday gift. She really loved putting the stickers on her bedroom wall. They are high quality, and peel off easily without damaging paint. Great purchase for any princess-loving kid.
customer_reviews.author: Go Blue 99

customer_reviews.title: Easy item/value
customer_reviews.text: It's all the princesses :-) Easy to use, remove and use again, I like that they have their names included, bright and bold coloring, everything as described by seller, I would recommend seller/item to others
customer_reviews.author: Jeri H.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I was actually very impressed with this wall decals set. It comes with more than just the Disney princesses. For example it has the Cinderella carriage and other details like that. Very nice set of decals for a girl who loves her Disney princesses
customer_reviews.author: Christina Lake

customer_reviews.title: Fairytale
customer_reviews.text: My daughter fell in LOVE with these decals she picked all the spots for each princess around the room and carefully placed each “accessory” sticker as she called them. She shows them off to everyone when they come over. Also we have removed and repositioned a few with moving furniture around they came off and restuck well but I don’t think I could get away with resticking them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mallah

customer_reviews.title: Thick vinyl/plastic
customer_reviews.text: These stickers are large, each character is about 11" tall. Quality vinyl/plastic does not tear after repeated repositioning on walls, glass and wood with no apparent residue. Great color and detail!
customer_reviews.author: L B

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got these and put them on the wall, surrounding the princess castle from this same brand. They look good and are vivid. We bought 3 different sets of decals from this brand, and they are all very good quality. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: MATTHEW T MILLER

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these!
customer_reviews.text: Theses are great! Easy to peel on and off and stick well to the wall without damaging it. Only wish it had Elsa and Anna since they are kinda a big deal in the house right now. Otherwise, no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff and Lauren

customer_reviews.title: looks good
customer_reviews.text: The princess wallpaper is very nice. My daughter likes it. But it is not very tight, easy to automatically tilt, I do not know is the relationship between the wall or stickers of course. It looks good
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: My daughter lives her big girl from and these princess are a big reason why! She moves the little accessory stickers a lot but the princesses have to stay put. Picture for size.
customer_reviews.author: KmmTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great decals!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an inexpensive way to decorate a princess lover's room, this is it. The decals are a nice size, there are lots of them, and the detail on them is beautiful. They are great quality, and stick to standard walls with no issues. Removing and reapplying is also very easy. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Decoration
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter loved seeing these on the wall. I was worried that they would be difficult to adhere-air bubbles that wouldn’t come out. But, they were very easy, and they haven’t fallen. We are very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: John McInnis

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old LOVES this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful!! Great sizes, great colors, and super easy to install. We have been using this brand for decoration in my daughter's playroom - we have moved to 2 different houses and they peel off and on without leaving residues. PERFECT.
customer_reviews.author: David Palomino

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these wall stickers. We used them to decorate the wall next to her bed. She really likes how they sparkle. They're high quality and a decent size (about 10" long) and come with little accent stickers too for each princess. I've had them for about 3 months now and haven't had an issue with them falling off the wall, which has a knockdown texture. I've even moved a few without any issues (I.e. no loss in sticking or raised edge from using my fingernail to loosen it.) Overall really good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: MS204

customer_reviews.title: Belle was torn,  otherwise adorable
customer_reviews.text: I was over-the-top excited to decorate my daughter's princess room. The stickers are adorable and the perfect size, however I was really disappointed because the Belle one was ripped in half. Belle is actually our favorite, and my daughter's name is Bella. She really wanted the other ones hung up so I put them on the wall so now I probably can't send back just the ripped Belle.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Peeling at edges
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, but I’m worried how long they’ll last. They’ve been up a week and are already peeling off the (very smooth) wall at the edges. I keep pressing them down again, but the edges won’t stay put
customer_reviews.author: Sapna

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wall Decals
customer_reviews.text: Everything you would expect in wall decals. Vibrant colors, easy to place and move. All the princesses and accessories depicted were included, each image is separate so you can arrange them how you want them
customer_reviews.author: wolfskitty

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute, glittery, and perfect for a princess room. There is a lot of stickers and they are a good size. I put them above my daughter’s (due in August) crib. Some of the smaller stickers are not pictures because I put them in other places around the room.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Worked great.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in my daughters room. We initially reapplied them a few times because we couldn’t decide how we wanted them and they continued to stick. After a few months we moved them again and they still worked great after reapplying.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. G

customer_reviews.title: Straight to the point review.
customer_reviews.text: They look great. Best to straighten the sticker out before placing them on the wall so they wont try to peel themselves off the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They are so cute and it came with a lot more stick ons then expected! It was an easy way to add some character to my daughter's room.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Dorris

customer_reviews.title: They stay without damaging the wall
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved these so Judy. She took them down and moved them several times, and they still stick to the walls in their new spot. And there was no damage. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: M. De Bagara

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: The colors are so vibrant, even when against the painted wall! I recommend this product. As you can see from the video, it’s very easy to peel and stick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I can give it more than five stars.
customer_reviews.text: We Moved into my husband’s childhood home which is a fixer upper and dont have funds for renovations just yet,, So we tried cheap ways to decorate for this christmas season and I must admit I’m LOVING IT!!! Our daughter loves it wish I can give it more stars!!!
customer_reviews.author: luv-lee

customer_reviews.title: Very cute for child's room.
customer_reviews.text: Simply adorable. Granddaughter is obsessed with Disney princesses so put them in "her room". She names them off every time she visits.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Purdy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stick well to textured walls
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic stickers! Great size and quality with beautiful sparkle (which doesn't shed). The best part is that they stick very well on my daughter's textured walls, even with my readjusting them twice. Highly recommend these stickers!
customer_reviews.author: WriteStuff31

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy for a 4-year old to peel off the backing without ripping the decal. Sticks to walls well, plus can be removed to reposition.
customer_reviews.author: Rambo

customer_reviews.title: Great Wall decor for girls room!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 years old loves princess! These stickers are great on the wall and bathroom cabinet doors. Peel off and re apply easily. Just have to be careful while getting it off from the original package. There are even glitters on the stickers! Great products!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: So perfect for a princess room!! We decorated my daughters room with these and they are so adorable! I would totally recommend these to anyone who needs some princess in their life.
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and bright - love the set
customer_reviews.text: The Disney Princesses in this pack are bright colored and large enough to see across a room. They look great on light colored walls (haven't tried them on darker). My daughter was super happy they included Jasmine in the set because she is harder and harder to come by. Some of the princesses have a few more miscellaneous items with her than others, but on average there about three accessories per princess. It makes my daughter's room a little happier for her, so totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Belle Luna

customer_reviews.title: Working well on textured wall
customer_reviews.text: Sticking well to my daughter’s room that has textured walls. Had a plastic odor when you open packaging but I dont notice the smell anymore and it’s been a day since applying them.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn T

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to remove an place , I’ve moved 3 times now An took these beautiful stickers with me for my children’s room each time an they still stick to the wall like if they were new!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great way to design
customer_reviews.text: Such great idea to create designs in your kids room. it’s sticks to wall great and it’s very easy to peel with no damages. it creates fund environment and very decorative.
customer_reviews.author: Fadi T.

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Disney Princess Collection!
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the BEST Disney Princess decal collection out there! I bought these for my daughter and she was over the moon excited! These are very colorful and very easy to apply, just peel and stick. They've been up for over 4 months now and they haven't peeled off at all.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Princess must have
customer_reviews.text: We made this purchase for my toddler. She was able to put this in places on the wall. A very fun project for our mother and daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved them. They were actually alot larger than what I thought they would be and cheaper than buying in store.
customer_reviews.author: Te Te

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Three-year-old daughter approved! These were super easy to apply and quite cheap for the difference they make in the room. May have to get another set of other characters from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch D.

customer_reviews.title: This is the second time we've bought these for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time we've bought these for my daughter's bedroom. We bought a new set when we moved. She loves the fact that she can rearrange them whenever she wants and they don't lose their stickiness.
customer_reviews.author: Cherienc

customer_reviews.title: Princess Sleepover
customer_reviews.text: They stick to walls very easily though my 3 yr old does wrinkle them during application. Simply remove and replace, no problem. The other night I caught her up after bedtime removing them from the wall and placing them on her pillows apparently wanting to have a "princess sleep over".
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: little girls room
customer_reviews.text: so cute in my daughter's room but they were not as big as I thought. But we all love 💘 it anyways
customer_reviews.author: joyce Tembi

customer_reviews.title: Very good adhesive!
customer_reviews.text: Best ones so far! Love how good they stick to the wall and how easy they are to remove! I switched them today twice so far and it sticks the same way! I would definitely buy from this seller again! Worth every dime.
customer_reviews.author: Yanibel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works really well with what I had in mind.Really makes my daughter’s room eye catching.
customer_reviews.author: Sira Medina

customer_reviews.title: Great decals
customer_reviews.text: My girls love these wall decals. They feel very quality. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A

customer_reviews.title: very beautiful
customer_reviews.text: these are very nice and beautiful they are kind of hard to remove so do it slowly
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter, I peeled them off the backing, but let her put them on the wall. They really made the plain room look nicer. They stick great, our walls are textured, but a 4 year old had no problem applying them and getting them to stick.
customer_reviews.author: Daphana

customer_reviews.title: really good quality
customer_reviews.text: used these on windows for a princess party. they came off easy and are now in my child's room on the walls
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute , wish they were a tad bigger but they’re great additions to walls !
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Decal product!
customer_reviews.text: These stickers peeled very easily from the packaging and stuck to the wall phenomenally! I didn't even have to scrub the wall before placing them on. They are sturdy enough to be moved around, as well. One of them did get a small tear as I removed it from the wall to be moved but it's nothing that's noticeable unless you're looking for it. They are true to size in the pictures. An excellent addition to any little girls room/play room!
customer_reviews.author: AmandaTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These stickers decals were bigger then I thought. My granddaughter loves these characters and are easy to peel and repost.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my little princess!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for my daughter's fifth birthday to put up in her room. She absolutely LOVES them. They were also easy enough to put up that she did many of them herself. So far, 3 months later they still look great, no corners peeling up or bubbles. FYI: We painted her wall, as well, and found out that you need to wait at least a month after painting to allow the paint to cure before putting the stickers on!
customer_reviews.author: who_kares

customer_reviews.title: Looks great

product_meta.title: RoomMates RMK2199SCS Disney Princess Royal Debut Peel And Stick Wall Decals
product_meta.description:
Celebrate royalty, enchantment and romance with the Disney Princess characters. These beautiful Disney Princess wall decals feature Cinderella, Ariel, Tiana, Rapunzel and more. The decals can be applied to any smooth surface and safely removed and re applied without any damage or residue. A perfect way to decorate your little princess's bedroom or play area.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Since 2006, RoomMates, the world’s largest manufacturer of peel and stick decorative products, has enabled consumers across the globe to transform their walls and other room accessories quickly, effortlessly and affordably.
RoomMates offers the largest, most varied (and we like to think “coolest”) selection of Wall Decals and Peel & Stick Wallpapers that install, reposition and remove in seconds without ever leaving any sticky residue or damage to the surface. Our Peel & StickTiles enable you to create a backsplash in minutes giving you the opportunity for a fun, fast, easy and always great-looking room/accessory make-over. Just Peel, Stick and done! 
Turn an ordinary space, furniture or accessory into anything but ordinary with RoomMates.
feature_bullets: Comes with 37 wall decals that range in size from 2.3 inches wide x 1.6 inches high to 8 inches wide x 9.5 inches high
Easy to apply just peel and stick
Wall decals are removable with no sticky residue
Wall decals made in the USA
